value.title: Orchestrating machine learning with pipelines
value.excerpt: Orchestrating machine learning training with pipelines is a key element of DevOps for machine learning. In this module, you'll learn how to create, publish, and run pipelines to train models in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Deploy MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL on Azure
value.excerpt: Compare Open Source Azure Database offerings with Azure SQL Server offerings. Configure an Open Source database and configure high availability and security options.

value.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
value.excerpt: In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP for deploying SAP solutions in Azure. In addition, you will look at the options for deploying SAP in Azure.

images.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure

value.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Simplify and protect access to devices and apps with intelligent identity and access management to increase security and productivity with Microsoft 365.

images.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.title: Explore and analyze time-stamped data with Time Series Insights
value.excerpt: Azure Time Series Insights allows you to collect, process, store, analyze, and query data at Internet Of Things (IoT) scale. Learn how to deploy this service and use it to gain insights from data generated by IoT devices.

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, and Azure Database for MySQL.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server
value.excerpt: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server

value.title: Improve the performance of an API by adding a caching policy in Azure API Management
value.excerpt:
API Management policies are configurable modules that you can add to APIs to change
their behaviors. Policies can do things like cache responses, transform documents and values,
call webhooks for notification or audit purposes, and retry requests after transient
failures. This module will use policies to enable caching in order to improve API performance
under load.

images.title: Improve the performance of an API by adding a caching policy in Azure API Management

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft commercial marketplace
value.excerpt: Overview of the Microsoft commercial marketplace, including Microsoft AppSource, Azure Marketplace, offer types, and Marketplace Rewards

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Explain the essential characteristics of the IoT Edge and the functionality of the IoT Edge components (modules, runtime, and cloud interface). Characterize the types of problems that you can solve with IoT Edge.  Describe how the elements of IoT Edge can be combined to solve the problem of deploying IoT applications in the cloud.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

value.title: Introduction to Kubernetes
value.excerpt: Determine the types of business problems that can be solved using Kubernetes. Describe the benefits of container orchestration with features like deployment management, automatic updates, and self-healing.

images.title: Introduction to Kubernetes

value.title: Introduction to Node.js
value.excerpt: Learn everything about Node.js: what it is, how does it work and when to use it.

value.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library
value.excerpt: Learn about programming and data types in Python

images.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library

value.title: Introduction to Git
value.excerpt: Find out what source control is, and get an introduction to Git - the world's most popular version control system.

images.title: Introduction to Git

value.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

images.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box family
value.excerpt: Evaluate Azure Data Box family to import terabytes (TBs) of data from a local computer to Azure Blob storage. Order disks. Copy data to disks and return them. Verify that the data is uploaded to Azure.

images.title: Move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box family

value.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
value.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

value.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

value.title: React to state changes in your Azure services by using Event Grid
value.excerpt: Build a serverless application architecture, automate your operations, and integrate applications by handling Azure events with Event Grid.

images.title: React to state changes in your Azure services by using Event Grid

value.title: Run nonfunctional tests in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run automated load tests by using Apache JMeter, a form of nonfunctional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

images.title: Run nonfunctional tests in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs
value.excerpt: Automate a task for a Web App that should run in the background without affecting the performance of the Web App.

images.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs

value.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

images.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Search and organize repository history by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to search and organize repository history by using filters, blame, and cross-linking on GitHub.

images.title: Search and organize repository history by using GitHub

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

images.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data
value.excerpt: Use unsupervised learning methods to predict groupings in data. Use variations of k-means clustering and spectral clustering to analyze and visualize difficult data sets.

images.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

images.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices

value.title: Implement a secure environment for a database service
value.excerpt: Implement SQL Server-based options for authentication and authorization, as well as Azure options for securing Azure SQL databases. Explore encryption, firewalls and advanced threat protection.

topItems.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
topItems.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

topItems.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
topItems.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

topItems.title: Implement compliance controls for sensitive data
topItems.excerpt: Explore data classification capabilities and degrees of confidentiality. Explore and configure advanced threat protection options, including SQL Injection.

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will be provided with a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI. You will be able to describe what AI happens to be and the technologies that underpin it. You will be able to share  how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: This module provides a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI and the technologies behind it. We then dive into how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

images.title: Introduction to AI technology

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: This module is a starting point for business decision makers who want to understand how Microsoft is creating products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI). We’ll also help you understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

images.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
Introduction to AI technology

value.title: Manage cloud resources
value.excerpt:
Learn more about how the cloud works by exploring it's underlying technology of virtualization, how to take advantage of the cloud for scale, and how to automate cloud resource management.
In this learning path, you will:

Learn about virtualization and how it's used in the cloud
Know what VMs and containers are
Understand what scale, load, and common load patterns are
Know what autoscaling is and be familiar with autoscaling techniques
Learn how to automate cloud resource management with scripts
Understand the concept of infrastructure-as-code

In Partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Understand virtualization
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

topItems.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity
topItems.excerpt: Discover what cloud elasticity means and different ways to scale your cloud resources.

images.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity

topItems.title: Automate cloud resource management
topItems.excerpt: Learn about how to automate cloud resource management with scripts and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.

images.title: Automate cloud resource management
